title: Video: Racquet – Surface
body:
Every now and then you find a song and visuals that just fit together perfectly, and this new video from **Racquet** is a stunning example of such an instance.

Filmed in Washington in April of last year, there are some simply breathtaking shots in here, utilising the gorgeous setting, and forming a brilliant backdrop for the track itself, which fills the middle ground between Daughter and London Grammar. There’s a real elegance to the project as whole; a truly transcendent experience. Check it out below.
